channel.title: Scripting guide on Cesar Rodriguez | Personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Scripting guide on Cesar Rodriguez | Personal blog

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide for Java
item.description: In this guide I will show how to write scripts in Frida.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (1) - Primitive Types
item.description: In this post I will explain how to use and instance different data types from Java with Frida.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (2) - Methods
item.description: In this post I will explain how to call methods from java through Frida.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (10) - Exception Handling
item.description: In this post I will explain how to try exception handling in Java with Frida.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (3) - Access to content of classes
item.description: In this blogpost I will explain how to access different methods with different visibilities in a class through Frida.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (4) - 'this' Reference
item.description: In this post I’ll show how to access the this reference.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (5) - Arrays
item.description: In this post I’ll explain how to use arrays from Java in Frida.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (6) - Enums
item.description: It is a bit complicated to work on Enums. There is a difference between Enums and common classes.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (8) - Inheritance
item.description: In this post I will show how to use inheritance in Java from Frida.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (9) - Inner Classes
item.description: In this blogpost I will show how to consume inner classes in Java from Frida.

item.title: Frida Scripting Guide (9) - Interfaces
item.description: An interface is a reference type in Java. It is similar to class.
